header.title: Settings
home.description: Manage your account, privacy, and security to make your Noraneko experience convenient and safe.
home.setup.title: Setup
home.setup.setupDescription: Complete the setup to get the most out of Noraneko.
home.privacyAndTrackingProtection.title: Privacy and Tracking Protection
home.privacyAndTrackingProtection.descri: Noraneko will work to properly protect your data and privacy by default, but you can also manage it manually.
home.ablazeAccount.title: Ablaze Accountï¼ˆComing Soonï¼‰
home.ablazeAccount.description: Mozilla Account is used to sync some of your data with other devices. Ablaze Account is used to sync data that cannot be synced with a Mozilla Account.
home.manageExtensions.title: Manage Extensions
home.manageExtensions.description: Noraneko allows you to manage the extensions available on addons.mozilla.org.
home.noranekoSupport.title: Noraneko Support
home.noranekoSupport.description: You can use the support written by Noraneko contributors.
design.customizePositionOfToolbars: Customize position of toolbars, change the style of tab bar, and customize appearance of Noraneko.
design.interfaceDescription: Select the design of the interface. "Lepton" is the default design.
design.useFaviconColorToBackgroundOfNavi: Use Favicon Color to Background of Navigation Bar
design.styleDescription: Select the style of the tab bar.
design.verticalTabIsRemovedFromNoraneko: Vertical Tab is removed from Noraneko. Use Firefox native Vertical Tab Bar instead.
design.positionDescription: Select the position of the tab bar.
design.showTabBarOnBottomOfNavigationBar: Show Tab Bar on Bottom of Navigation Bar
design.showTabBarOnBottomOfWindow: Show Tab Bar on Bottom of Window
design.tab.title: Tabs
design.tab.scrollDescription: Select the behavior of the tab bar when scrolling.
design.tab.pinTitle: Show the title of the pinned tab.
design.tab.openPositionDescription: Specify the position where new tabs will open. If you follow Firefox's behavior, the position will vary depending on how you open your links.
design.tab.openLast: Open at the end of the tab bar
design.tab.openNext: Open next to the current tab
about.noranekoDescription: Noraneko is one of the domestically developed browsers in Japan. It is developed under Ablaze based on Firefox to make the web better.
about.copyright: Â© 2024 Noraneko Project. All rights reserved.
about.openSourceLicense: Noraneko is open-source software available to everyone under the Mozilla Public License 2.0, made possible by the Firefox open-source project and other open-source software.
search.searchResultsDescription: Search results for "{{query}}". Only Noraneko settings are searched, Firefox settings are not included in the search.
